lead_paragraph: GOLDBERG--William. It is with great sadness that we must say goodbye to a dear, compassionate, gentle soul. Billy was deeply devoted to his friends and family. His kindness and thoughtfulness will be missed. He is survived by his sister and her husband Debbie and Bruce Bottner, his cousin Marsha Block, her husband Leonard Walter, and his other cousin Robin Block Goldstein and her husband Mitchell, and many devoted friends. Billy, we love you. The Funeral will be held at Sinai Chapels in Fresh Meadows, NY, at 10:30am on Sunday, July 3, followed by a graveside service at Beth David Cemetery in Elmont, NY. 1/3
